title: Add ticket management UI
description: Create TicketsView, TicketRowView, and TicketEditorView for managing project tickets within GitBar.

title: Implement TicketService
description: Create a service to read/write tickets from .gitbar/tickets.jsonl files.

title: Create Claude Code skill for tickets
description: Build a global skill at ~/.claude/skills/gitbar-tickets/ that allows Claude to manage tickets via /tickets command.
